name: Bartholomew Kuma
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Revolutionary Army
effect: [On K.O.] Play up to 1 {Revolutionary Army} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.
trigger: [Trigger] If your Leader has the {Revolutionary Army} type and you and your opponent have a total of 5 or less Life cards, play this card.
